tom_hanks.name: Tom Hanks
tom_hanks.biography: Tom Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker, widely regarded as one of the greatest actors in film history. Known for his versatility and everyman persona, he has starred in numerous critically acclaimed and commercially successful films spanning multiple decades.

movies.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood

awards: Academy Award for Best Actor - Philadelphia (1994)
Academy Award for Best Actor - Forrest Gump (1995)
Golden Globe Award for Best Actor - Big (1989)
Golden Globe Award for Best Actor - Forrest Gump (1995)
Presidential Medal of Freedom (2016)

taylor_swift.name: Taylor Swift
taylor_swift.biography: Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter who has become one of the most influential and best-selling music artists of all time. Known for narrative songwriting often inspired by her personal life, she has successfully transitioned from country to pop music while consistently breaking records.
awards: Grammy Award for Album of the Year - Fearless (2010)
Grammy Award for Album of the Year - 1989 (2016)
Grammy Award for Album of the Year - Folklore (2021)
Grammy Award for Album of the Year - Midnights (2024)
Billboard Woman of the Decade (2019)
Time Person of the Year (2023)

dwayne_johnson.name: Dwayne Johnson
dwayne_johnson.biography: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson is an American actor, producer, and former professional wrestler. After a successful wrestling career in WWE, he became one of the highest-paid and most popular actors in Hollywood, known for his charismatic presence and action film roles.
awards: WWE Championship (10 times)
Royal Rumble Winner (2000)
Teen Choice Award for Choice Movie Actor: Action
Hollywood Walk of Fame Star (2017)

scarlett_johansson.name: Scarlett Johansson
scarlett_johansson.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
scarlett_johansson.biography: Scarlett Johansson is an American actress and singer. She is one of the world's highest-paid actresses and has been featured multiple times on Forbes' Celebrity 100 list. Known for her versatility, she has starred in a wide range of films from independent dramas to major blockbusters.
awards: BAFTA Award for Best Actress - Lost in Translation (2004)
Tony Award for Best Featured Actress (2010)
Saturn Award for Best Actress - Lucy (2015)
Academy Award Nomination - Marriage Story (2020)
Academy Award Nomination - Jojo Rabbit (2020)

george_michael.name: George Michael
george_michael.biography: George Michael was a British singer, songwriter, and record producer who rose to fame as a member of the pop duo Wham! before embarking on a highly successful solo career. Known for his soulful voice and heartfelt songwriting, he became one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
awards: Grammy Award for Album of the Year - Faith (1989)
Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance (1989)
Brit Award for Best British Male Solo Artist (1988, 1997)
MTV Video Music Award for Best Male Video (1989)
American Music Award for Favorite Pop/Rock Male Artist (1989)
